newsitem.title: EGYPT: Free Spinalex share for July 31 holders.
newsitem.headline: Free Spinalex share for July 31 holders.

text.p: Alexandria Spinning and Weaving/Spinalex said on Tuesday that people holding shares on July 31 this year would be eligible for the one-for-one free shares it has agreed to distribute.
The shares will be distributed through the central depositary system from August 1, it added.
The company announced the free share offer in December. It will double the company's capital to 3.851 million pounds ($1.13 million) from 1.926 million.
The partly privatised company also gave out a dividend of 1.1199 pounds per share for the financial year 1995/6, which ended last June 30.
